subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Paula Creamer birdied her two final holes for a six-under-par 66 yesterday to tie Beth Bader and Young Kim for the third-round lead at the L.P.G.A. Corning Classic.
snippet: Paula Creamer birdied her two final holes for a six-under-par 66 yesterday to tie Beth Bader and Young Kim for the third-round lead at the L.P.G.A. Corning Classic.
